channel.title: Aids = Jews
channel.description:
[b][size=10pt][color=orange]I have recently came across something that will change the World.
I have discovered that AIDs = Jews, and I HAVE PROOF!!
[color=red]First off, open a new tab and go to [url=http://www.translate.google.com/]Google Translator[/url] [img]http://i50.tinypic.com/2d17a74.png[/img] [color=black]Second, Type in "AIDS" in the following box. [color=blue]Third, make sure you are translating FROM: ENGLISH. [color=magenta]Fourth, make sure you are tanslating IN TO: YIDDISH. [color=green]Fifth, hit the Translate button.
[color=orange]Now, you're going to get this weird word coming out, looks like "[color=black]אַידס[color=orange]"
Now, copy and paste that word back into the text box. [img]http://i50.tinypic.com/142ae6a.png[/img] [color=cyan]Now, hit the SWAP TRANSLATIONS button. [color=blue]You should now be translating FROM: YIDDISH. [color=magenta]And IN TO: ENGLISH. [color=green]Hit the Translate button. [color=red]ENGLISH TRANSLATION = JEWS.

item.title: Aids = Jews
item.dc:creator: @ChaosPkers ChaosPkers
item.description:
@ChaosPkers wrote:

Hitler was right! i fucking knew it!!!

item.title: Aids = Jews
item.dc:creator: @GrimReapersScythe GrimReapersScythe
item.description:
@GrimReapersScythe wrote:

[b][size=10pt][color=orange]I have recently came across something that will change the World.

I have discovered that AIDs = Jews, and I HAVE PROOF!!

[color=red]First off, open a new tab and go to Google Translator

2d17a74.png721×607

[color=black]Second, Type in “AIDS” in the following box.
[color=blue]Third, make sure you are translating FROM: ENGLISH.
[color=magenta]Fourth, make sure you are tanslating IN TO: YIDDISH.
[color=green]Fifth, hit the Translate button.

[color=orange]Now, you’re going to get this weird word coming out, looks like “[color=black]אַידס[color=orange]”

Now, copy and paste that word back into the text box.

142ae6a.png720×598

[color=cyan]Now, hit the SWAP TRANSLATIONS button.
[color=blue]You should now be translating FROM: YIDDISH.
[color=magenta]And IN TO: ENGLISH.
[color=green]Hit the Translate button.
[color=red]ENGLISH TRANSLATION = JEWS.

Read full topic
